title: Brand value of Reebok 2012 to 2017
yAxis: Brand value in billion U.S. dollars
summary: The statistic shows the Brand value of Reebok from 2012 to 2017 , according to the Brand Finance valuation methodology .
The ranking , provided by The Banker Magazine , is an independent , publicly reported measure of the strength of a Brand and its impact across all business lines and customer groups .
In 2017 , the Brand value of Reebok was valued at 0.8 billion U.S. dollars and the bank was ranked third in its peer group .
gold: The statistic shows the brand value of the sports company Reebok from 2012 to 2017.
Reebok had a brand value of 0.8 billion U.S. dollars in 2017 .
